title: Anti-arthritic and antioxidant potential of
abstract: Rheumatoid arthritis (RA) is a long-lasting ailment mostly disturbing joints and managed with disease-modifying antirheumatic drug (DMARDs), corticosteroids, and NSAIDs, along with immunosuppressants, though these cause serious adverse effects.
